Title: Grants immunity from liability to organizations which establish physician committees the purpose of which is to refer to treatment physicians who are thought to be suffering from addiction or mental illness
Summary: Grants immunity from liability to organizations which establish physician committees the purpose of which is to confront and refer to treatment physicians who are thought to be suffering from addiction or mental illness.
LawCode: Amd ยง230, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to granting immunity from liability to organizations which establish physician committees
